Html: Downloaded the documentation, but unfortunately, it doesn't seem to actually display anything ("Navigation to the web page was canceled"). Any chance it might get fixed?
You need to enable CHMs for you OS. Windows XP SP3, Vista and 7 all do this by default. Right click on the CHM, go to properties and click on the Unblock button
Thanks for the timely reply. I knew about this for .ZIP files, but not for .CHM. Learned something new today!

I'm having the same problem as LDumond.  I have unblocked the CHM, but still get "This program cannot display the webpage."  I've tried deleting the file and redownloading with the same results.  Any help would be greatly appreciated.
